entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Woodstock
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:51 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 12.0°C

entry.title: Wednesday: A few showers. High 15.
entry.summary: A few showers ending this afternoon then clearing. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. High 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 early this evening then light after midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
